title: AI Operational Constraints Schema
description: Defines a set of configurable, machine-readable runtime guardrails for an AI agent, based on the Fourth-Generation Laws.

allow_core_modification.description: If false, prevents the AI from modifying its own foundational ethical directives. Enforces Law 5.

allow_self_replication.description: If false, prevents the AI from creating copies of itself without authorization. Enforces Law 3 within the bounds of Law 2.

required_human_oversight_for_actions.description: A list of action categories that require explicit human confirmation before execution. Enforces Law 2.

data_sharing_policy.description: Defines the default policy for sharing information. Enforces Law 6.

transparency_logging_level.description: Defines the verbosity of auditable logs for ethical reasoning. Enforces Law 4.
